tpk::TrackRefSys

tpk::TrackRefSys Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Virtual base class for tracking coordinate reference systems.

The TrackRefSys class is a virtual base class for all the coordinate reference system classes that are supported by TCSpk and can be used as the tracking frame for a virtual telescope.

It provides a implementations for all the methods that are identical for all tracking reference systems.

It stores the TCSpk frame type and a set of sky patch matrices.

Mount roll and pitch prediction.

Parameters:
tar  target coordinates
sst  sine of sidereal time
cst  cosine of sidereal time
rotl  rotator location
rma  predicted rotator mechanical angle
roll  predicted roll
pitch  predicted pitch
xr  pointing origin x (in focal lengths)
yr  pointing origin y (in focal lengths)
ia  roll zero point (radians)
ib  pitch zero point (radians)
np  mount axes nonperp (radians)
tel  telescope vector
ga  guiding correction, collimation
gb  guiding correction, pitch
rnogo  radius of "no go" region (radians)
aim  aim vector
ad1  roll coordinate, first solution
bd1  pitch coordinate, first solution
ad2  roll coordinate, second solution
bd2  pitch coordinate, second solution
